sentences.en: A spokesman at China Telecom declined to comment on the merger report.
sentences.cn: 而同时中国联通和中国网通的发言人们的评论还无法立即获得.

sentences.en: British Telecom agreed to keep overall price increases to 7.5 per cent below inflation.

sentences.en: Foreign makers of telecom equipment are also expected to prosper from WTO.

sentences.en: France Telecom is a textbook model of what can be achieved by a state-owned company.
sentences.cn: 法国电信是国有公司成功的典范。

sentences.en: Intelligent Multi - service Network Enables Telecom Service Providers to Make Profit.
Telecom service convergence and network convergence are two associated but different concepts.

sentences.en: The entire telecom sector has been suffering from a lack of sales.
sentences.cn: 整个电信部门一直在经受销售不景气之苦。

sentences.en: The telecom industry in Australia is very small in comparison with the rest of the world.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚电信业与世界其他地区电信业相比规模很小。

sentences.en: TI has seen its shares suffer because of a flight of capital from telecom and Internet-related businesses.
sentences.cn: 德州仪器的股票因为资金从电信和因特网相关企业外逃而遭受损失。
